nodes.text: "Creatures of Endor" is an article published through the StarWars.com website on November 23, 2004. It provides information on several of the species found on the Forest Moon of Endor. The article was a tie-in to the DVD releases of The Haunted Village and Tales from the Endor Woods, feature-length recuts of eight episodes of Ewoks animated television series. Accordingly, the species featured in the article all appear in Star Wars: Ewoks.
